title: right-facing fist: light skin tone

nouns: The raised fist is a symbol of solidarity and support.
Hand with the fingers curled into the palm
The closed hand with the fingers on the palm.
A fist is an action where a hand has the fingers curled into the palm and the thumb retracted, displaying the knuckles.
A hand that has the fingers curled into the palm and the thumb retracted, displaying the knuckles
Hand with the fingers clenched or curled inward
A hand with the fingers clenched in the palm (as for hitting)

description: This version of the  Right-facing Fist emoji has the  Light Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Pale Skin Tone on supported platf
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the right-facing fist emoji appears strong and dynamic, rendered with a light skin tone that exhibits subtle highlights and shadows for a realistic 3D effect. Its rounded edges and polished surface, hallmarks of Apple's design language, give it a tactile and impactful presence. This emoji is commonly used to signify solidarity, agreement, a call to action, or a powerful statement of support in messages across Apple devices.
